Side Effects: cough.....gain weight.......
It is the only medicine that has controlled my blood pressure with no side effects. Lopressor made my lips and face swell
Uncontrollable cough. It got worse over the months that I used it. Finally had to switch meds.
pounding heart; chest pressure; shortness of breath_poor sleep
Comments: I have taken Tarka 2 for almost 2 years.  After losing 30 lbs_ I started to have side effects. Prior to weight loss_ Tarka successfully controlled my blood pressure and heart rate with no problems. I now take a diuretic and have no side effects.

Side Effects: developed an almost constant hacking dry cough_ which is a well known side effect of ACE inhibitors.  I couldn't go anywhere without coughing.  Did lower BP but MD changed it to an ARB.
Comments: Tarka is a brand named combination pill_ very expensive.  Ask your MD for generic Verapamil_ and generic Trandolapril.  Same exact meds only at at least 1/2 the price.

Side Effects: Dry Cough
Sleeplessness
Comments: Started taking 4/240 after Mavik 4mg didn't control pressure. Took it at night so AM pressure wouldn't be high. Worked_ but couldn't sleep. Now taking it in the AM_ but pressure isn't controlled as well. Dr. considering a change.

Side Effects: dry_ hacking cough during the night_ loss of sex drive_ fatigue
Comments: Immediately lowered my blood pressure to a normal level

Side Effects: Loss of sex drive _ doesnot control blood bressure for very long_causes a lot of sleepyness_ Joint pain dailey_ un sure if it contributes to otherproblems such as constipation. feel draged out and tire all time.
Comments: Have been taking one tablet dailey 4/240mg seems to cause more problems than it helps. have been on this for aver 3 years so I would think there has been plenty of time to adjust to and & all changes it causes. seems to only work for about 6 hours then any activity cause blood pressure to climb again.

Side Effects: At first I was quite tired.I had little energy.  After taking the drug for about 2 weeks_ everything was back to normal again.
Comments: After being on 4 different medications_ this one controls my B/P perfectly.  It was 140/90_ but now it is 124/70.  No side effects whatsoever.

Side Effects: headaches_ nausua_ anxiety_ pounding heart at times_ sluggish at times_ constipation_ dry coughing (Dr said it was a common side effect)
Comments: Dr. started me on 2/180 for blood pressure at 140/80. While on Tarka bp was up and down_ but avg of 130/80. Discontiuned it due to nausua feeling everyday_ making it hard to eat daily. Headaches in the begining were terrible_ but after 4 days reduced to managable headaches. Was taking Tarka_ 2 Advil_ and Prilosec daily.

Side Effects: Headaches_ blurred vision_ no stamina_ grey/green palor to skin color_ blood pressure erratic_ high (140/100)then(120/80)within few minutes/ reduced libido(sex drive)_ blotchy patches of skin upper body_ just to list a few!
Comments: I have stopped this medication_ tapering off_ and then using herbal/vitamin supplements_ reversed the side effects_ which took some time to completly go away_ and I feel much better then when on Tarka_ and have mostly an acceptable BP in the 120/130 OVER 80/90 range_ which is better_ most of the time_ then when on Tarka.

Reason: slight  white coat syndrome b p
Side Effects: sweats_ headache  nausea___aches_ extreme exhaustion_ dizzy_ flu like feelings for 9 days___stopped taking and will see dr tomorrow to try other.
Minimal. Some dizziness. Much better than Lotrel or Toprol.

dry cough at the beginning_ still have headaches but not as bad_ have had some constipation_ currently experencing hot flashes_ very tired_ can't seem to get in the sun b/c if I get too hot I get dizzy and can feel my heart beat throbbing through my body_ I have also gained about 15 pounds since taking this medicine....I was not a small woman when I started taking this med and really didn't need to gain any weight...I would like to be able to find something that can counter the weight gain...
Comments: my blood pressure has gone down drastically but really would like to be able to get in the sun

Side Effects: A little dry cough and a little constipation at the start_ but now that I've adjusted to the med_ I'm doing well on it.
Comments: My MD started me on 2/180 Tarka and increased to 2/240 as my B/P was going up at night again.  Since then_ my B/P has come down to 130/80

Side Effects: verapamil was no longer working_ doc switched me to this..so far it is making my bp too low_ I am dizzy. Readings on verapamil was 140ish/100ish...so far with Tarks - 98/68 avg. Not better today - calling Doc.

Reason: hight bp and rapid heart beats
Side Effects: Constipation
Comments: So far I've only noticed constipation I'm hoping it will go away as times goes on...my heart beats fast I'm going to talk to my doc about it tomorrow. It did wonders for my bp. I've only been on it for 1 week.

Side Effects: constipation
none
systolic number worsened with tarka. tried 2/240mg...didnt work so we tried 4/240mg and bp was even worse. I wouldnt reccommend to anyone.

Joint pain_ reduced sex drive_ impotence.  Lotension worked as well_ with no side effects.  My Doctor fell victim to the savvy talk of a drug salesman.  Even driving a car became a chore due to joint pain_ and doing yard work was impossible
Joint pain_ reduced sex drive.  This medicine reduced my BP to on average 160/85.  Did nothing for the top number_ but reduced the bottom.
Comments: I have never experienced joint pain or back pain except very rarely until taking Tarka.

Side Effects: joint pain_ impotence
Comments: Doctor said I was diabetic (A1c never over 5) and changed to this.  Doesn't control my BP even at double dose (2-240 bid)_ too strong a diuretic element_ and impotence at age 53.  Firing the Doc and going back to Tenormin or Tenoretic - they worked.

Side Effects: dry coughing started the same day i started it
awareness of heart pounding_ rapid pulse_ almost manic feelings and blood pressure did not drop
Comments: I have been on a beta blocker for a long time and I was taken off it and put on this.  I think I was experiencing withdrawal from beta blocker_ which I am now back on and feel much more like myself.
